overview:
After the tremendous success of the first start-up Tobi was involved in - studiVZ.net - he is now already running his second baby - shoeboxed.com.

Tobi studied business administration at top private business schools in Germany, France and the United States. Having gained extensive knowledge of investment banking through 12 months working in capital markets for SociÃ©tÃ© GÃ©nÃ©rale in Paris and experience in mergers and acquisitions at Morgan Stanley in Frankfurt, Tobi joined studiVZ.net, now the largest website in continental Europe, in 2006.

Acting as vice president for international markets, Tobi planned, implemented and supervised the companyâ€™s roll out to eight foreign markets, leading a team of 60 people and managing a one-digit million Euro budget. The company now has an English-language version that you can check out, meinVZ.net.
